definition: skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice squeezed in some ice time while in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯美國國務卿賴斯擠出一些時間在冰場上。

sentences.english: The disco ball over the rink sprinkled dizzying light through her long-again hair.
sentences.chinese: 在冰場的迪斯科球灑通過她的長頭髮又令人眩目的光。

sentences.english: I think I'd rather go to the rink.
There is a big skating ground near our school.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校附近有一個大型溜冰場。

sentences.english: You can hire skate at the rink.
You can rent roller skates at the skating arena .
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場你能夠租到溜冰鞋。

sentences.english: We can either go to the one next to my house or the one in Tien Mou Park.
sentences.chinese: 我們到我家隔壁或天母公園的溜冰場都可以。

sentences.english: Well, there is an ice skating rink which is fun for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那兒有個對每個人來說都其樂無窮的溜冰場。

sentences.english: Every winter outdoor ice skating rinks appear all over Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天，戶外溜冰場在北京各處可見。

sentences.english: Expounds the air conditioning system design of artificial ice rink.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了人工冰場的空調設計。

sentences.english: Visit a skate park together and watch older kids do tricks.
sentences.chinese: 一起參觀溜冰場，看年長點的孩子的溜冰技巧。

sentences.english: I love winter, love skating field partners more fun slapstick scenes.
sentences.chinese: 我愛冬天，更愛滑冰場上夥伴們歡樂玩鬧的場景。

sentences.english: They turn this entire area in the center here to an ice skating rink.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的中心是個溜冰場。

sentences.english: The performance does not end when the skater leaves the ice.
sentences.chinese: 其實表演在花滑運動員離開冰場後並未結束。

sentences.english: Our company is the first Coordinated Process Company to supply and manufacture rinks in China.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是國內首家真冰滑冰場供應制作一條龍企業。

sentences.english: Skating on the skating rink is good fun.
sentences.chinese: 在溜冰場溜冰是很有趣的。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
